        <td id="L187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="187"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="190"></td>
        <td id="LC190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="191"></td>
        <td id="LC191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="192"></td>
        <td id="LC192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">NOTICE</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="193"></td>
        <td id="LC193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="194"></td>
        <td id="LC194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="195"></td>
        <td id="LC195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Persons attempting to find a motive in this narrative will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="196"></td>
        <td id="LC196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prosecuted; persons attempting to find a moral in it will be banished;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="197"></td>
        <td id="LC197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persons attempting to find a plot in it will be shot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="198"></td>
        <td id="LC198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="199"></td>
        <td id="LC199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   By Order of the Author,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="200"></td>
        <td id="LC200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Per G. G., Chief of Ordnance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="201"></td>
        <td id="LC201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="202"></td>
        <td id="LC202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="203"></td>
        <td id="LC203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="204"></td>
        <td id="LC204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="205"></td>
        <td id="LC205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">EXPLANATORY</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="206"></td>
        <td id="LC206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="207"></td>
        <td id="LC207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="208"></td>
        <td id="LC208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In this book a number of dialects are used, to wit: the Missouri negro</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="209"></td>
        <td id="LC209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dialect; the extremest form of the backwoods Southwestern dialect; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="210"></td>
        <td id="LC210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordinary &quot;Pike County&quot; dialect; and four modified varieties of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="211"></td>
        <td id="LC211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last. The shadings have not been done in a haphazard fashion, or by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="212"></td>
        <td id="LC212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guesswork; but painstakingly, and with the trustworthy guidance and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="213"></td>
        <td id="LC213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">support of personal familiarity with these several forms of speech.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="214"></td>
        <td id="LC214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="215"></td>
        <td id="LC215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I make this explanation for the reason that without it many readers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="216"></td>
        <td id="LC216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would suppose that all these characters were trying to talk alike and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="217"></td>
        <td id="LC217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not succeeding.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="218"></td>
        <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="219"></td>
        <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   The Author.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="220"></td>
        <td id="LC220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="221"></td>
        <td id="LC221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="222"></td>
        <td id="LC222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="223"></td>
        <td id="LC223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="224"></td>
        <td id="LC224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">HUCKLEBERRY FINN</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="225"></td>
        <td id="LC225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="226"></td>
        <td id="LC226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="227"></td>
        <td id="LC227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="228"></td>
        <td id="LC228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="229"></td>
        <td id="LC229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="230"></td>
        <td id="LC230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You don&#39;t know about me without you have read a book by the name of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="231"></td>
        <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_The Adventures of Tom Sawyer;_ but that ain&#39;t no matter. That book</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="232"></td>
        <td id="LC232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was made by Mr. Mark Twain, and he told the truth, mainly. There was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="233"></td>
        <td id="LC233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things which he stretched, but mainly he told the truth. That is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="234"></td>
        <td id="LC234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing. I never seen anybody but lied one time or another, without it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="235"></td>
        <td id="LC235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was Aunt Polly, or the widow, or maybe Mary. Aunt Polly--Tom&#39;s Aunt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="236"></td>
        <td id="LC236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Polly, she is--and Mary, and the Widow Douglas is all told about in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="237"></td>
        <td id="LC237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that book, which is mostly a true book, with some stretchers, as I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="238"></td>
        <td id="LC238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="239"></td>
        <td id="LC239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="240"></td>
        <td id="LC240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now the way that the book winds up is this: Tom and me found the money</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="241"></td>
        <td id="LC241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the robbers hid in the cave, and it made us rich. We got six</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="242"></td>
        <td id="LC242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand dollars apiece--all gold. It was an awful sight of money when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="243"></td>
        <td id="LC243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was piled up. Well, Judge Thatcher he took it and put it out at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="244"></td>
        <td id="LC244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest, and it fetched us a dollar a day apiece all the year</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="336"></td>
        <td id="LC336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know. Well, after a long time I heard the clock away off in the town</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="337"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="338"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="339"></td>
        <td id="LC339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trees--something was a-stirring. I set still and listened. Directly I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="340"></td>
        <td id="LC340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could just barely hear a &quot;me-yow! me-yow!&quot; down there. That was good!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="341"></td>
        <td id="LC341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Says I, &quot;me-yow! me-yow!&quot; as soft as I could, and then I put out the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="352"></td>
        <td id="LC352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We went tiptoeing along a path amongst the trees back toward the end</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="353"></td>

        <td id="L427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="427"></td>
        <td id="LC427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there and give Jim anything they had, just for a sight of that</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="428"></td>
        <td id="LC428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">five-center piece; but they wouldn&#39;t touch it, because the devil had</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="429"></td>
        <td id="LC429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had his hands on it. Jim was most ruined for a servant, because he got</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="430"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="432"></td>

        <td id="L441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="441"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="449"></td>
        <td id="LC449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="450"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="515"></td>
        <td id="LC515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t know. But that&#39;s what they do. I&#39;ve seen it in books; and so</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="516"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="517"></td>
        <td id="LC517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="518"></td>
        <td id="LC518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But how can we do it if we don&#39;t know what it is?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="519"></td>
        <td id="LC519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="520"></td>
        <td id="LC520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, blame it all, we&#39;ve _got_ to do it. Don&#39;t I tell you it&#39;s in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="521"></td>
        <td id="LC521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">books?  Do you want to go to doing different from what&#39;s in the books,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="588"></td>
        <td id="LC588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER III</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="589"></td>
        <td id="LC589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="590"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="591"></td>
        <td id="LC591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I got a good going-over in the morning from old Miss Watson on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="592"></td>
        <td id="LC592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account of my clothes; but the widow she didn&#39;t scold, but only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="593"></td>
        <td id="LC593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cleaned off the grease and clay, and looked so sorry that I thought I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="594"></td>
        <td id="LC594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would behave awhile if I could. Then Miss Watson she took me in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="595"></td>
        <td id="LC595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closet and prayed, but nothing come of it. She told me to pray every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="596"></td>
        <td id="LC596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day, and whatever I asked for I would get it. But it warn&#39;t so. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="597"></td>
        <td id="LC597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tried it. Once I got a fish-line, but no hooks. It warn&#39;t any good to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="598"></td>
        <td id="LC598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me without hooks. I tried for the hooks three or four times, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="599"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="600"></td>
        <td id="LC600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Watson to try for me, but she said I was a fool. She never told me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="601"></td>
        <td id="LC601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">why, and I couldn&#39;t make it out no way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="602"></td>
        <td id="LC602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="603"></td>
        <td id="LC603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I set down one time back in the woods, and had a long think about it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="604"></td>
        <td id="LC604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I says to myself, if a body can get anything they pray for, why don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="605"></td>
        <td id="LC605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Deacon Winn get back the money he lost on pork? Why can&#39;t the widow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="606"></td>
        <td id="LC606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get back her silver snuff-box that was stole? Why can&#39;t Miss Watson</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="607"></td>
        <td id="LC607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fat up? No, says I to myself, there ain&#39;t nothing in it. I went and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="608"></td>
        <td id="LC608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told the widow about it, and she said the thing a body could get by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="609"></td>
        <td id="LC609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">praying for it was &quot;spiritual gifts.&quot; This was too many for me, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="610"></td>
        <td id="LC610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she told me what she meant--I must help other people, and do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="611"></td>
        <td id="LC611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything I could for other people, and look out for them all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="612"></td>
        <td id="LC612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and never think about myself. This was including Miss Watson, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="613"></td>
        <td id="LC613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I took it. I went out in the woods and turned it over in my mind a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="614"></td>
        <td id="LC614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long time, but I couldn&#39;t see no advantage about it--except for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="615"></td>
        <td id="LC615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other people; so at last I reckoned I wouldn&#39;t worry about it any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="616"></td>
        <td id="LC616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more, but just let it go. Sometimes the widow would take me one side</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="617"></td>
        <td id="LC617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and talk about Providence in a way to make a body&#39;s mouth water; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="618"></td>
        <td id="LC618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maybe next day Miss Watson would take hold and knock it all down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="619"></td>
        <td id="LC619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again. I judged I could see that there was two Providences, and a poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="620"></td>
        <td id="LC620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chap would stand considerable show with the widow&#39;s Providence, but if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="621"></td>
        <td id="LC621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Watson&#39;s got him there warn&#39;t no help for him any more. I thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="622"></td>
        <td id="LC622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it all out, and reckoned I would belong to the widow&#39;s if he wanted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="623"></td>
        <td id="LC623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, though I couldn&#39;t make out how he was a-going to be any better off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="624"></td>
        <td id="LC624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then than what he was before, seeing I was so ignorant, and so kind of</td>

        <td id="L625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="625"></td>
        <td id="LC625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">low-down and ornery.</td>

        <td id="L626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="626"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="627"></td>
        <td id="LC627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pap he hadn&#39;t been seen for more than a year, and that was comfortable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="628"></td>
        <td id="LC628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me; I didn&#39;t want to see him no more. He used to always whale me</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="629"></td>
        <td id="LC629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he was sober and could get his hands on me; though I used to take</td>

        <td id="L630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="630"></td>
        <td id="LC630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the woods most of the time when he was around. Well, about this</td>

        <td id="L631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="631"></td>
        <td id="LC631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time he was found in the river drownded, about twelve mile above town,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="632"></td>

        <td id="L633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="633"></td>

        <td id="L634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="634"></td>

        <td id="L635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="635"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="636"></td>

        <td id="L637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="637"></td>
        <td id="LC637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and buried him on the bank. But I warn&#39;t comfortable long, because I</td>

        <td id="L638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="638"></td>

        <td id="LC639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man don&#39;t float on his back, but on his face. So I knowed, then, that</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="641"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="644"></td>

        <td id="L658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="658"></td>

        <td id="L660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="660"></td>

        <td id="L665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="665"></td>

        <td id="L697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="697"></td>

        <td id="L698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="698"></td>

        <td id="L699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="699"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="704"></td>
        <td id="LC704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Who makes them tear around so?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="705"></td>
        <td id="LC705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="706"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="799"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="800"></td>
        <td id="LC800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, sir,&quot; I says, &quot;I don&#39;t want to spend it. I don&#39;t want it at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="801"></td>
        <td id="LC801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all--nor the six thousand, nuther. I want you to take it; I want to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="802"></td>
        <td id="LC802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give it to you--the six thousand and all.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="803"></td>
        <td id="LC803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="804"></td>
        <td id="LC804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looked surprised. He couldn&#39;t seem to make it out. He says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="805"></td>
        <td id="LC805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="806"></td>
        <td id="LC806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, what can you mean, my boy?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="807"></td>
        <td id="LC807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="808"></td>
        <td id="LC808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I says, &quot;Don&#39;t you ask me no questions about it, please. You&#39;ll take</td>

        <td id="L810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="810"></td>

        <td id="LC815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Please take it,&quot; says I, &quot;and don&#39;t ask me nothing--then I won&#39;t have</td>

        <td id="L816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="816"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="830"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="831"></td>
        <td id="LC831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Watson&#39;s nigger, Jim, had a hair-ball as big as your fist, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="832"></td>
        <td id="LC832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been took out of the fourth stomach of an ox, and he used to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="833"></td>
        <td id="LC833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">magic with it. He said there was a spirit inside of it, and it knowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="834"></td>
        <td id="LC834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything. So I went to him that night and told him pap was here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="835"></td>
        <td id="LC835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again, for I found his tracks in the snow. What I wanted to know was,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="836"></td>
        <td id="LC836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what he was going to do, and was he going to stay? Jim got out his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="837"></td>
        <td id="LC837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hair-ball and said something over it, and then he held it up and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="838"></td>
        <td id="LC838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dropped it on the floor. It fell pretty solid, and only rolled about</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an inch. Jim tried it again, and then another time, and it acted just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="840"></td>
        <td id="LC840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same. Jim got down on his knees, and put his ear against it and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="841"></td>
        <td id="LC841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">listened. But it warn&#39;t no use; he said it wouldn&#39;t talk. He said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="842"></td>
        <td id="LC842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes it wouldn&#39;t talk without money. I told him I had an old</td>

        <td id="L843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="843"></td>
        <td id="LC843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slick counterfeit quarter that warn&#39;t no good because the brass showed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>
        <td id="LC844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the silver a little, and it wouldn&#39;t pass nohow, even if the</td>

        <td id="L846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="846"></td>
        <td id="LC846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would tell on it every time. (I reckoned I wouldn&#39;t say nothing about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="847"></td>
        <td id="LC847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dollar I got from the judge.) I said it was pretty bad money, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="848"></td>
        <td id="LC848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maybe the hair-ball would take it, because maybe it wouldn&#39;t know the</td>

        <td id="L849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="849"></td>
        <td id="LC849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difference. Jim smelt it and bit it and rubbed it, and said he would</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="850"></td>
        <td id="LC850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manage so the hair-ball would think it was good. He said he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="851"></td>
        <td id="LC851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">split open a raw Irish potato and stick the quarter in between and</td>

        <td id="L852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="852"></td>

        <td id="LC855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do that before, but I had forgot it.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="856"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="857"></td>
        <td id="LC857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim put the quarter under the hair-ball, and got down and listened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="858"></td>
        <td id="LC858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again. This time he said the hair-ball was all right. He said it would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="859"></td>
        <td id="LC859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell my whole fortune if I wanted it to. I says, go on. So the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="860"></td>
        <td id="LC860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hair-ball talked to Jim, and Jim told it to me. He says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="861"></td>
        <td id="LC861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="862"></td>
        <td id="LC862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yo&#39; ole father doan&#39; know yit what he&#39;s a-gwyne to do. Sometimes he</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="863"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="864"></td>
        <td id="LC864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">res&#39; easy en let de ole man take his own way. Dey&#39;s two angels</td>

        <td id="L865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="865"></td>
        <td id="LC865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hoverin&#39; roun&#39; &#39;bout him. One uv &#39;em is white en shiny, en t&#39;other one</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="866"></td>

        <td id="L867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="867"></td>
        <td id="LC867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black one sail in en bust it all up. A body can&#39;t tell yit which one</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gwyne to fetch him at de las&#39;. But you is all right. You gwyne to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="869"></td>
        <td id="LC869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considable trouble in yo&#39; life, en considable joy. Sometimes you gwyne</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="870"></td>
        <td id="LC870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to git hurt, en sometimes you gwyne to git sick; but every time you&#39;s</td>

        <td id="LC871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gwyne to git well ag&#39;in. Dey&#39;s two gals flyin&#39; &#39;bout you in yo&#39; life.</td>

        <td id="L872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="872"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="877"></td>

        <td id="L878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="878"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="883"></td>
        <td id="LC883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER V</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="884"></td>
        <td id="LC884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="885"></td>
        <td id="LC885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="886"></td>
        <td id="LC886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had shut the door to. Then I turned around, and there he was. I used</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="887"></td>
        <td id="LC887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be scared of him all the time, he tanned me so much. I reckoned I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="888"></td>
        <td id="LC888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was scared now, too; but in a minute I see I was mistaken--that is,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="889"></td>
        <td id="LC889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after the first jolt, as you may say, when my breath sort of hitched,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="890"></td>
        <td id="LC890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he being so unexpected; but right away after I see I warn&#39;t scared of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="983"></td>

        <td id="L1066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1066"></td>

        <td id="L1070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1070"></td>

        <td id="LC1071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started on it; so every now and then I&#39;d borrow two or three dollars</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1072"></td>
        <td id="LC1072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off of the judge for him, to keep from getting a cowhiding. Every time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1073"></td>
        <td id="LC1073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he got money he got drunk; and every time he got drunk he raised Cain</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1248"></td>
        <td id="LC1248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steal the key, or saw myself out, one or t&#39;other. He drank and drank,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1249"></td>
        <td id="LC1249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tumbled down on his blankets by and by; but luck didn&#39;t run my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1250"></td>
        <td id="LC1250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way. He didn&#39;t go sound asleep, but was uneasy. He groaned and moaned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1251"></td>
        <td id="LC1251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and thrashed around this way and that for a long time. At last I got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1252"></td>
        <td id="LC1252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so sleepy I couldn&#39;t keep my eyes open all I could do, and so before I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1253"></td>
        <td id="LC1253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowed what I was about I was sound asleep, and the candle burning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1254"></td>
        <td id="LC1254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1255"></td>
        <td id="LC1255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I don&#39;t know how long I was asleep, but all of a sudden there was an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1256"></td>
        <td id="LC1256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awful scream and I was up. There was pap looking wild, and skipping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1257"></td>
        <td id="LC1257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around every which way and yelling about snakes. He said they was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1258"></td>
        <td id="LC1258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crawling up his legs; and then he would give a jump and scream, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1259"></td>
        <td id="LC1259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say one had bit him on the cheek--but I couldn&#39;t see no snakes. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1260"></td>
        <td id="LC1260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started and run round and round the cabin, hollering &quot;Take him off!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1261"></td>
        <td id="LC1261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take him off! he&#39;s biting me on the neck!&quot; I never see a man look so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1262"></td>
        <td id="LC1262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wild in the eyes. Pretty soon he was all fagged out, and fell down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1263"></td>
        <td id="LC1263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">panting; then he rolled over and over wonderful fast, kicking things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1264"></td>
        <td id="LC1264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every which way, and striking and grabbing at the air with his hands,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1265"></td>
        <td id="LC1265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and screaming and saying there was devils a-hold of him. He wore out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1266"></td>
        <td id="LC1266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by and by, and laid still awhile, moaning. Then he laid stiller, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1267"></td>
        <td id="LC1267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">didn&#39;t make a sound. I could hear the owls and the wolves away off in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1268"></td>
        <td id="LC1268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the woods, and it seemed terrible still. He was laying over by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1269"></td>
        <td id="LC1269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corner. By and by he raised up part way and listened, with his head to</td>

        <td id="L1270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1270"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="L1280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1280"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="L1286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1286"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1310"></td>
        <td id="LC1310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I opened my eyes and looked around, trying to make out where I was. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1311"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1320"></td>

        <td id="L1326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1326"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1327"></td>
        <td id="LC1327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along in a minute.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1328"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1329"></td>
        <td id="LC1329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He unlocked the door, and I cleared out up the river-bank. I noticed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1330"></td>
        <td id="LC1330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some pieces of limbs and such things floating down, and a sprinkling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1331"></td>
        <td id="LC1331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of bark; so I knowed the river had begun to rise. I reckoned I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1332"></td>
        <td id="LC1332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have great times now if I was over at the town. The June rise used to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1333"></td>
        <td id="LC1333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be always luck for me; because as soon as that rise begins here comes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1334"></td>
        <td id="LC1334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cordwood floating down, and pieces of log rafts--sometimes a dozen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1335"></td>
        <td id="LC1335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">logs together; so all you have to do is to catch them and sell them to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1336"></td>
        <td id="LC1336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the woodyards and the sawmill.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1337"></td>
        <td id="LC1337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1338"></td>
        <td id="LC1338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I went along up the bank with one eye out for pap and t&#39;other one out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1339"></td>
        <td id="LC1339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for what the rise might fetch along. Well, all at once here comes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1340"></td>
        <td id="LC1340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">canoe; just a beauty, too, about thirteen or fourteen foot long,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1341"></td>
        <td id="LC1341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">riding high like a duck. I shot head-first off of the bank like a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1342"></td>
        <td id="LC1342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frog, clothes and all on, and struck out for the canoe. I just</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1343"></td>
        <td id="LC1343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expected there&#39;d be somebody laying down in it, because people often</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1344"></td>
        <td id="LC1344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done that to fool folks, and when a chap had pulled a skiff out most</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1345"></td>
        <td id="LC1345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to it they&#39;d raise up and laugh at him. But it warn&#39;t so this time. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1346"></td>
        <td id="LC1346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a drift-canoe sure enough, and I clumb in and paddled her ashore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1347"></td>
        <td id="LC1347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thinks I, the old man will be glad when he sees this--she&#39;s worth ten</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1349"></td>

        <td id="LC1351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then, &#39;stead of taking to the woods when I run off, I&#39;d go down the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>

        <td id="L1400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1400"></td>

        <td id="LC1410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had wore the ground a good deal crawling out of the hole and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1416"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1420"></td>
        <td id="LC1420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was all grass clear to the canoe, so I hadn&#39;t left a track. I</td>

        <td id="L1421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1421"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1422"></td>
        <td id="LC1422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">river. All safe. So I took the gun and went up a piece into the woods,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1423"></td>
        <td id="LC1423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and was hunting around for some birds when I see a wild pig; hogs soon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1424"></td>
        <td id="LC1424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went wild in them bottoms after they had got away from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1425"></td>
        <td id="LC1425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prairie-farms. I shot this fellow and took him into camp.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1426"></td>
        <td id="LC1426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1427"></td>
        <td id="LC1427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I took the ax and smashed in the door. I beat it and hacked it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1428"></td>

        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>

        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hot. Jim laid it in with all his might, for he was most about starved.</td>

        <td id="LC2236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again; and about the first thing we done was to bait one of the big</td>

        <td id="L2237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2237"></td>
        <td id="LC2237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hooks with a skinned rabbit and set it and catch a catfish that was as</td>

        <td id="LC2238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">big as a man, being six foot two inches long, and weighed over two</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2318"></td>
        <td id="LC2318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She said she wouldn&#39;t let me go by myself, but her husband would be in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2319"></td>
        <td id="LC2319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by and by, maybe in a hour and a half, and she&#39;d send him along with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2320"></td>
        <td id="LC2320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. Then she got to talking about her husband, and about her relations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2321"></td>
        <td id="LC2321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the river, and her relations down the river, and about how much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2322"></td>
        <td id="LC2322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better off they used to was, and how they didn&#39;t know but they&#39;d made</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2595"></td>
        <td id="LC2595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I took the canoe out from the shore a little piece, and took a look;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2596"></td>
        <td id="LC2596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but if there was a boat around I couldn&#39;t see it, for stars and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2597"></td>
        <td id="LC2597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadows ain&#39;t good to see by. Then we got out the raft and slipped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2598"></td>
        <td id="LC2598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along down in the shade, past the foot of the island dead still--never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2599"></td>
        <td id="LC2599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying a word.</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2604"></td>
        <td id="LC2604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2605"></td>
        <td id="LC2605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2607"></td>
        <td id="LC2607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It must &#39;a&#39; been close on to one o&#39;clock when we got below the island</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2608"></td>
        <td id="LC2608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at last, and the raft did seem to go mighty slow. If a boat was to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2609"></td>
        <td id="LC2609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come along we was going to take to the canoe and break for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2610"></td>
        <td id="LC2610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Illinois shore; and it was well a boat didn&#39;t come, for we hadn&#39;t ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2611"></td>
        <td id="LC2611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought to put the gun in the canoe, or a fishing-line, or anything to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2612"></td>
        <td id="LC2612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eat. We was in ruther too much of a sweat to think of so many things.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2613"></td>
        <td id="LC2613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It warn&#39;t good judgment to put _everything_ on the raft.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2614"></td>
        <td id="LC2614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2615"></td>
        <td id="LC2615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If the men went to the island I just expect they found the camp-fire I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2616"></td>
        <td id="LC2616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">built, and watched it all night for Jim to come. Anyways, they stayed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2617"></td>
        <td id="LC2617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away from us, and if my building the fire never fooled them it warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2618"></td>
        <td id="LC2618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no fault of mine. I played it as low down on them as I could.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2619"></td>
        <td id="LC2619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2620"></td>
        <td id="LC2620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the first streak of day began to show we tied up to a towhead in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2621"></td>
        <td id="LC2621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a big bend on the Illinois side, and hacked off cottonwood branches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2622"></td>
        <td id="LC2622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the hatchet, and covered up the raft with them so she looked like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2623"></td>
        <td id="LC2623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there had been a cave-in in the bank there. A towhead is a sand-bar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2624"></td>
        <td id="LC2624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that has cottonwoods on it as thick as harrow-teeth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2625"></td>
        <td id="LC2625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2626"></td>
        <td id="LC2626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had mountains on the Missouri shore and heavy timber on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2627"></td>
        <td id="LC2627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Illinois side, and the channel was down the Missouri shore at that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2628"></td>
        <td id="LC2628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place, so we warn&#39;t afraid of anybody running across us. We laid there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2629"></td>
        <td id="LC2629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all day, and watched the rafts and steamboats spin down the Missouri</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2630"></td>
        <td id="LC2630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shore, and up-bound steamboats fight the big river in the middle. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2631"></td>
        <td id="LC2631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told Jim all about the time I had jabbering with that woman; and Jim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2632"></td>
        <td id="LC2632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said she was a smart one, and if she was to start after us herself she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2633"></td>
        <td id="LC2633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wouldn&#39;t set down and watch a camp-fire--no, sir, she&#39;d fetch a dog.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2634"></td>
        <td id="LC2634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, then, I said, why couldn&#39;t she tell her husband to fetch a dog?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2635"></td>
        <td id="LC2635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim said he bet she did think of it by the time the men was ready to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2636"></td>
        <td id="LC2636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">start, and he believed they must &#39;a&#39; gone up-town to get a dog and so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2637"></td>

        <td id="L2638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2638"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2639"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2641"></td>
        <td id="LC2641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2642"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2645"></td>

        <td id="L2646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2646"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2648"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2650"></td>

        <td id="L2651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2651"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2652"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2653"></td>

        <td id="L2656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2656"></td>
        <td id="LC2656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting run over; but we wouldn&#39;t have to light it for up-stream boats</td>

        <td id="L2657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2657"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2658"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2659"></td>
        <td id="LC2659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up-bound boats didn&#39;t always run the channel, but hunted easy water.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2660"></td>
        <td id="LC2660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2661"></td>
        <td id="LC2661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This second night we run between seven and eight hours, with a current</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2662"></td>
        <td id="LC2662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that was making over four mile an hour. We catched fish and talked,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2663"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2664"></td>
        <td id="LC2664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemn, drifting down the big, still river, laying on our backs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2665"></td>
        <td id="LC2665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking up at the stars, and we didn&#39;t ever feel like talking loud,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2666"></td>
        <td id="LC2666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and it warn&#39;t often that we laughed--only a little kind of a low</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2667"></td>
        <td id="LC2667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chuckle. We had mighty good weather as a general thing, and nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2668"></td>
        <td id="LC2668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever happened to us at all--that night, nor the next, nor the next.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2669"></td>
        <td id="LC2669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2670"></td>
        <td id="LC2670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every night we passed towns, some of them away up on black hillsides,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2671"></td>
        <td id="LC2671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing but just a shiny bed of lights; not a house could you see. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2672"></td>
        <td id="LC2672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fifth night we passed St. Louis, and it was like the whole world lit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2673"></td>
        <td id="LC2673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up. In St. Petersburg they used to say there was twenty or thirty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2674"></td>
        <td id="LC2674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand people in St. Louis, but I never believed it till I see that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2675"></td>
        <td id="LC2675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wonderful spread of lights at two o&#39;clock that still night. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2676"></td>
        <td id="LC2676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warn&#39;t a sound there; everybody was asleep.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2677"></td>
        <td id="LC2677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2678"></td>
        <td id="LC2678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every night now I used to slip ashore toward ten o&#39;clock at some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2679"></td>
        <td id="LC2679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little village, and buy ten or fifteen cents&#39; worth of meal or bacon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2680"></td>
        <td id="LC2680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or other stuff to eat; and sometimes I lifted a chicken that warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2681"></td>
        <td id="LC2681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roosting comfortable, and took him along. Pap always said, take a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2682"></td>
        <td id="LC2682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chicken when you get a chance, because if you don&#39;t want him yourself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2683"></td>
        <td id="LC2683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you can easy find somebody that does, and a good deed ain&#39;t ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2684"></td>

        <td id="L2687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2687"></td>

        <td id="L2772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2772"></td>
        <td id="LC2772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2861"></td>
        <td id="LC2861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">git aroun&#39; it; it ain&#39;t good sense, it ain&#39;t good morals. Ain&#39;t I</td>

        <td id="L2862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2862"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2890"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2892"></td>
        <td id="LC2892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I catched my breath and most fainted. Shut up on a wreck with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2893"></td>
        <td id="LC2893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a gang as that! But it warn&#39;t no time to be sentimentering. We&#39;d</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2894"></td>
        <td id="LC2894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_got_ to find that boat now--had to have it for ourselves. So we went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2895"></td>
        <td id="LC2895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a-quaking and shaking down the stabboard side, and slow work it was,</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2897"></td>
        <td id="LC2897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said he didn&#39;t believe he could go any farther--so scared he hadn&#39;t</td>

        <td id="LC2899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on this wreck we are in a fix, sure. So on we prowled again. We struck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>

        <td id="L2901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2901"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2905"></td>

        <td id="LC2933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The door slammed to because it was on the careened side; and in a half</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2944"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2945"></td>
