      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2946"></td>
        <td id="LC2946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand that they was in just as much trouble now as Jim Turner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2947"></td>
        <td id="LC2947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>
        <td id="LC2948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2949"></td>
        <td id="LC2949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Jim manned the oars, and we took out after our raft. Now was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2950"></td>
        <td id="LC2950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first time that I begun to worry about the men--I reckon I hadn&#39;t had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2951"></td>
        <td id="LC2951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time to before. I begun to think how dreadful it was, even for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2952"></td>
        <td id="LC2952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">murderers, to be in such a fix. I says to myself, there ain&#39;t no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2953"></td>
        <td id="LC2953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">telling but I might come to be a murderer myself yet, and then how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2954"></td>
        <td id="LC2954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would I like it?  So says I to Jim:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2955"></td>
        <td id="LC2955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2956"></td>
        <td id="LC2956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The first light we see we&#39;ll land a hundred yards below it or above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2957"></td>
        <td id="LC2957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, in a place where it&#39;s a good hiding-place for you and the skiff,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2958"></td>
        <td id="LC2958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then I&#39;ll go and fix up some kind of a yarn, and get somebody to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2959"></td>
        <td id="LC2959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go for that gang and get them out of their scrape, so they can be hung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2960"></td>
        <td id="LC2960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when their time comes.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2961"></td>
        <td id="LC2961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2962"></td>
        <td id="LC2962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But that idea was a failure; for pretty soon it begun to storm again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2963"></td>
        <td id="LC2963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and this time worse than ever. The rain poured down, and never a light</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2964"></td>
        <td id="LC2964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">showed; everybody in bed, I reckon. We boomed along down the river,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2965"></td>
        <td id="LC2965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching for lights and watching for our raft. After a long time the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2966"></td>
        <td id="LC2966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rain let up, but the clouds stayed, and the lightning kept whimpering,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2967"></td>
        <td id="LC2967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by and by a flash showed us a black thing ahead, floating, and we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2968"></td>
        <td id="LC2968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made for it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2969"></td>
        <td id="LC2969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>
        <td id="LC2970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the raft, and mighty glad was we to get aboard of it again. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2971"></td>
        <td id="LC2971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen a light now away down to the right, on shore. So I said I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>
        <td id="LC2972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go for it. The skiff was half full of plunder which that gang had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>
        <td id="LC2973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stole there on the wreck. We hustled it on to the raft in a pile, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>
        <td id="LC2974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I told Jim to float along down, and show a light when he judged he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2975"></td>
        <td id="LC2975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone about two mile, and keep it burning till I come; then I manned my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oars and shoved for the light. As I got down towards it three or  four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more showed--up on a hillside. It was a village. I closed in above the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shore light, and laid on my oars and floated. As I went by I see it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a lantern hanging on the jackstaff of a double-hull ferryboat. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">skimmed around for the watchman, a-wondering whereabouts he slept; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2981"></td>
        <td id="LC2981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by and by I found him roosting on the bitts forward, with his head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2982"></td>
        <td id="LC2982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down between his knees. I gave his shoulder two or three little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2983"></td>
        <td id="LC2983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoves, and begun to cry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2984"></td>
        <td id="LC2984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2985"></td>
        <td id="LC2985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He stirred up in a kind of a startlish way; but when he see it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2986"></td>
        <td id="LC2986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only me he took a good gap and stretch, and then he says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2987"></td>
        <td id="LC2987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2988"></td>
        <td id="LC2988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hello, what&#39;s up? Don&#39;t cry, bub. What&#39;s the trouble?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2989"></td>
        <td id="LC2989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2990"></td>
        <td id="LC2990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2991"></td>

        <td id="L2994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2994"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2995"></td>
        <td id="LC2995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2996"></td>
        <td id="LC2996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh, dang it now, _don&#39;t_ take on so; we all has to have our troubles,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2997"></td>
        <td id="LC2997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and this &#39;n &#39;ll come out all right. What&#39;s the matter with &#39;em?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2998"></td>
        <td id="LC2998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2999"></td>
        <td id="LC2999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;They&#39;re--they&#39;re--are you the watchman of the boat?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3000"></td>
        <td id="LC3000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3001"></td>
        <td id="LC3001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes,&quot; he says, kind of pretty-well-satisfied like. &quot;I&#39;m the captain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3002"></td>
        <td id="LC3002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the owner and the mate and the pilot and watchman and head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3003"></td>
        <td id="LC3003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deck-hand; and sometimes I&#39;m the freight and passengers. I ain&#39;t as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3004"></td>
        <td id="LC3004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rich as old Jim Hornback, and I can&#39;t be so blame&#39; generous and good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3005"></td>
        <td id="LC3005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Tom, Dick, and Harry as what he is, and slam around money the way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3006"></td>
        <td id="LC3006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he does; but I&#39;ve told him a many a time &#39;t I wouldn&#39;t trade places</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3007"></td>
        <td id="LC3007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with him; for, says I, a sailor&#39;s life&#39;s the life for me, and I&#39;m</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3008"></td>
        <td id="LC3008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">derned if _I&#39;d_ live two mile out o&#39; town, where there ain&#39;t nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3009"></td>
        <td id="LC3009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever goin&#39; on, not for all his spondulicks and as much more on top of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3010"></td>
        <td id="LC3010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. Says I--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3011"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3012"></td>
        <td id="LC3012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I broke in and says:</td>

        <td id="LC3013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L3039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3039"></td>

        <td id="L3041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3041"></td>
        <td id="LC3041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Easy enough. Miss Hooker was a-visiting up there to the town--&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3042"></td>
        <td id="LC3042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3043"></td>
        <td id="LC3043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, Booth&#39;s Landing--go on.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3044"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3125"></td>
        <td id="LC3125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By and by, when we got up, we turned over the truck the gang had stole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3126"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3127"></td>
        <td id="LC3127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorts of other things, and a lot of books, and a spy-glass, and three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3128"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3129"></td>
        <td id="LC3129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our lives. The seegars was prime. We laid off all the afternoon in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3130"></td>
        <td id="LC3130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woods talking, and me reading the books, and having a general good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3131"></td>
        <td id="LC3131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. I told Jim all about what happened inside the wreck and at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3132"></td>
        <td id="LC3132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ferryboat, and I said these kinds of things was adventures; but he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3133"></td>
        <td id="LC3133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said he didn&#39;t want no more adventures. He said that when I went in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC3314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3315"></td>
        <td id="LC3315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3316"></td>
        <td id="LC3316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Well_, den! Dad blame it, why doan&#39; he _talk_ like a man? You answer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3317"></td>
        <td id="LC3317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me _dat!&quot;_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3318"></td>
        <td id="LC3318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3319"></td>
        <td id="LC3319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I see it warn&#39;t no use wasting words--you can&#39;t learn a nigger to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3320"></td>
        <td id="LC3320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">argue. So I quit.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3321"></td>

        <td id="L3324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3324"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3325"></td>
        <td id="LC3325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XV</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3326"></td>
        <td id="LC3326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3327"></td>
        <td id="LC3327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3328"></td>
        <td id="LC3328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We judged that three nights more would fetch us to Cairo, at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3329"></td>
        <td id="LC3329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bottom of Illinois, where the Ohio River comes in, and that was what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3330"></td>
        <td id="LC3330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we was after. We would sell the raft and get on a steamboat and go way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3331"></td>
        <td id="LC3331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the Ohio amongst the free states, and then be out of trouble.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3332"></td>
        <td id="LC3332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3333"></td>
        <td id="LC3333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, the second night a fog begun to come on, and we made for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3334"></td>
        <td id="LC3334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towhead to tie to, for it wouldn&#39;t do to try to run in a fog; but when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3335"></td>
        <td id="LC3335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I paddled ahead in the canoe, with the line to make fast, there warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3336"></td>
        <td id="LC3336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything but little saplings to tie to. I passed the line around one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3337"></td>
        <td id="LC3337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them right on the edge of the cut bank, but there was a stiff</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3338"></td>
        <td id="LC3338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">current, and the raft come booming down so lively she tore it out by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3339"></td>
        <td id="LC3339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the roots and away she went. I see the fog closing down, and it made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3340"></td>
        <td id="LC3340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me so sick and scared I couldn&#39;t budge for most a half a minute it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3341"></td>
        <td id="LC3341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to me--and then there warn&#39;t no raft in sight; you couldn&#39;t see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3342"></td>
        <td id="LC3342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty yards. I jumped into the canoe and run back to the stern, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3343"></td>
        <td id="LC3343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grabbed the paddle and set her back a stroke. But she didn&#39;t come. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3344"></td>
        <td id="LC3344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was in such a hurry I hadn&#39;t untied her. I got up and tried to untie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3345"></td>
        <td id="LC3345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her, but I was so excited my hands shook so I couldn&#39;t hardly do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3346"></td>
        <td id="LC3346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything with them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3347"></td>
        <td id="LC3347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3348"></td>
        <td id="LC3348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As soon as I got started I took out after the raft, hot and heavy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3349"></td>
        <td id="LC3349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right down the towhead. That was all right as far as it went, but the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3350"></td>
        <td id="LC3350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towhead warn&#39;t sixty yards long, and the minute I flew by the foot of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3351"></td>
        <td id="LC3351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it I shot out into the solid white fog, and hadn&#39;t no more idea which</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3352"></td>
        <td id="LC3352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way I was going than a dead man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3353"></td>
        <td id="LC3353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3354"></td>
        <td id="LC3354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thinks I, it won&#39;t do to paddle; first I know I&#39;ll run into the bank</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3355"></td>
        <td id="LC3355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or a towhead or something; I got to set still and float, and yet it&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3356"></td>
        <td id="LC3356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mighty fidgety business to have to hold your hands still at such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3357"></td>
        <td id="LC3357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time. I whooped and listened. Away down there somewheres I hears a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3358"></td>
        <td id="LC3358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">small whoop, and up comes my spirits. I went tearing after it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3359"></td>
        <td id="LC3359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">listening sharp to hear it again. The next time it come I see I warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3360"></td>
        <td id="LC3360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heading for it, but heading away to the right of it. And the next time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3361"></td>
        <td id="LC3361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was heading away to the left of it--and not gaining on it much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3362"></td>
        <td id="LC3362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either, for I was flying around, this way and that and t&#39;other, but it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3363"></td>
        <td id="LC3363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was going straight ahead all the time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3364"></td>
        <td id="LC3364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3365"></td>
        <td id="LC3365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did wish the fool would think to beat a tin pan, and beat it all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3366"></td>
        <td id="LC3366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, but he never did, and it was the still places between the whoops</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3367"></td>
        <td id="LC3367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that was making the trouble for me. Well, I fought along, and directly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3368"></td>
        <td id="LC3368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hears the whoop _behind_ me. I was tangled good now. That was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3369"></td>
        <td id="LC3369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somebody else&#39;s whoop, or else I was turned around.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3370"></td>
        <td id="LC3370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3371"></td>
        <td id="LC3371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I throwed the paddle down. I heard the whoop again; it was behind me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3372"></td>
        <td id="LC3372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet, but in a different place; it kept coming, and kept changing its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3373"></td>
        <td id="LC3373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place, and I kept answering, till by and by it was in front of me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3374"></td>
        <td id="LC3374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again, and I knowed the current had swung the canoe&#39;s head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3375"></td>
        <td id="LC3375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down-stream, and I was all right if that was Jim and not some other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3376"></td>
        <td id="LC3376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raftsman hollering. I couldn&#39;t tell nothing about voices in a fog, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3377"></td>
        <td id="LC3377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing don&#39;t look natural nor sound natural in a fog.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3378"></td>
        <td id="LC3378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3379"></td>
        <td id="LC3379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The whooping went on, and in about a minute I come a-booming down on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3380"></td>
        <td id="LC3380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cut bank with smoky ghosts of big trees on it, and the current throwed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3381"></td>
        <td id="LC3381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me off to the left and shot by, amongst a lot of snags that fairly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3382"></td>
        <td id="LC3382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roared, the current was tearing by them so swift.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3383"></td>
        <td id="LC3383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3384"></td>
        <td id="LC3384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In another second or two it was solid white and still again. I set</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3385"></td>
        <td id="LC3385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perfectly still then, listening to my heart thump, and I reckon I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3386"></td>
        <td id="LC3386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">didn&#39;t draw a breath while it thumped a hundred.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3387"></td>
        <td id="LC3387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3388"></td>
        <td id="LC3388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I just give up then. I knowed what the matter was. That cut bank was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3389"></td>
        <td id="LC3389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an island, and Jim had gone down t&#39;other side of it. It warn&#39;t no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3390"></td>
        <td id="LC3390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towhead that you could float by in ten minutes. It had the big timber</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3391"></td>
        <td id="LC3391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a regular island; it might be five or six miles long and more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3392"></td>
        <td id="LC3392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half a mile wide.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3393"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3394"></td>
        <td id="LC3394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I kept quiet, with my ears cocked, about fifteen minutes, I reckon. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3395"></td>
        <td id="LC3395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was floating along, of course, four or five miles an hour; but you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3396"></td>
        <td id="LC3396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don&#39;t ever think of that. No, you _feel_ like you are laying dead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3397"></td>
        <td id="LC3397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still on the water; and if a little glimpse of a snag slips by you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3398"></td>
        <td id="LC3398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don&#39;t think to yourself how fast _you&#39;re_ going, but you catch your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3399"></td>
        <td id="LC3399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breath and think, my! how that snag&#39;s tearing along. If you think it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3400"></td>
        <td id="LC3400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ain&#39;t dismal and lonesome out in a fog that way by yourself in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3401"></td>
        <td id="LC3401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, you try it once--you&#39;ll see.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3402"></td>
        <td id="LC3402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3403"></td>
        <td id="LC3403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next, for about a half an hour, I whoops now and then; at last I hears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3404"></td>
        <td id="LC3404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the answer a long ways off, and tries to follow it, but I couldn&#39;t do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3580"></td>
        <td id="LC3580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We slept most all day, and started out at night, a little ways behind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3581"></td>
        <td id="LC3581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a monstrous long raft that was as long going by as a procession. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3582"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thirty men, likely. She had five big wigwams aboard, wide apart, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3584"></td>
        <td id="LC3584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an open camp-fire in the middle, and a tall flag-pole at each end.</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So the old lady says:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4310"></td>

        <td id="L4311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4311"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4325"></td>

        <td id="L4397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4397"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4399"></td>
        <td id="LC4399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4400"></td>
        <td id="LC4400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Quick! Jump for the woods!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4401"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4757"></td>
        <td id="LC4757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4758"></td>
        <td id="LC4758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Good lan&#39;! is dat you, honey? Doan&#39; make no noise.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4759"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4760"></td>
        <td id="LC4760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was Jim&#39;s voice--nothing ever sounded so good before. I run along</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4761"></td>
        <td id="LC4761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bank a piece and got aboard, and Jim he grabbed me and hugged me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4762"></td>
        <td id="LC4762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was so glad to see me. He says:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4763"></td>

        <td id="L4764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4764"></td>
        <td id="LC4764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Laws bless you, chile, I &#39;uz right down sho&#39; you&#39;s dead ag&#39;in. Jack&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4765"></td>

        <td id="L4771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4771"></td>

        <td id="L4774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4774"></td>

        <td id="L4778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4778"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4779"></td>
        <td id="LC4779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the middle of the Mississippi. Then we hung up our signal lantern, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4780"></td>
        <td id="LC4780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">judged that we was free and safe once more. I hadn&#39;t had a bite to eat</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4781"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4783"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4784"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4785"></td>
        <td id="LC4785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so was Jim to get away from the swamp. We said there warn&#39;t no home</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4786"></td>

        <td id="LC4787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smothery, but a raft don&#39;t. You feel mighty free and easy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4788"></td>

        <td id="L4793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4793"></td>
        <td id="LC4793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XIX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4794"></td>

        <td id="L4795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4795"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4796"></td>
        <td id="LC4796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two or three days and nights went by; I reckon I might say they swum</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4797"></td>
        <td id="LC4797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by, they slid along so quiet and smooth and lovely. Here is the way we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4798"></td>
        <td id="LC4798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put in the time. It was a monstrous big river down there--sometimes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4799"></td>
        <td id="LC4799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mile and a half wide; we run nights, and laid up and hid daytimes;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4800"></td>
        <td id="LC4800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soon as night was most gone we stopped navigating and tied up--nearly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4801"></td>
        <td id="LC4801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always in the dead water under a towhead; and then cut young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4802"></td>
        <td id="LC4802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cottonwoods and willows, and hid the raft with them. Then we set out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4803"></td>
        <td id="LC4803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lines. Next we slid into the river and had a swim, so as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4804"></td>
        <td id="LC4804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freshen up and cool off; then we set down on the sandy bottom where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4805"></td>
        <td id="LC4805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the water was about knee-deep, and watched the daylight come. Not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4806"></td>
        <td id="LC4806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sound anywheres--perfectly still--just like the whole world was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4807"></td>
        <td id="LC4807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asleep, only sometimes the bullfrogs a-cluttering, maybe. The first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4808"></td>
        <td id="LC4808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing to see, looking away over the water, was a kind of dull</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4809"></td>
        <td id="LC4809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">line--that was the woods on t&#39;other side; you couldn&#39;t make nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4810"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4811"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4812"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4813"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4814"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4815"></td>
        <td id="LC4815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jumbled-up voices, it was so still, and sounds come so far; and by and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4816"></td>
        <td id="LC4816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by you could see a streak on the water which you know by the look of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4817"></td>
        <td id="LC4817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the streak that there&#39;s a snag there in a swift current which breaks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4818"></td>
        <td id="LC4818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on it and makes that streak look that way; and you see the mist curl</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4819"></td>
        <td id="LC4819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up off of the water, and the east reddens up, and the river, and you</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4820"></td>
        <td id="LC4820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make out a log cabin in the edge of the woods, away on the bank on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4821"></td>
        <td id="LC4821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">t&#39;other side of the river, being a wood-yard, likely, and piled by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4822"></td>
        <td id="LC4822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them cheats so you can throw a dog through it anywheres; then the nice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4823"></td>
        <td id="LC4823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breeze springs up, and comes fanning you from over there, so cool and</td>

        <td id="L4824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4824"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4826"></td>
        <td id="LC4826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gars and such, and they do get pretty rank; and next you&#39;ve got the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4827"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4828"></td>
        <td id="LC4828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going it!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4829"></td>
        <td id="LC4829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4830"></td>
        <td id="LC4830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A little smoke couldn&#39;t be noticed now, so we would take some fish off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4831"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4832"></td>
        <td id="LC4832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watch the lonesomeness of the river, and kind of lazy along, and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4833"></td>
        <td id="LC4833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by lazy off to sleep. Wake up by and by, and look to see what done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4834"></td>
        <td id="LC4834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, and maybe see a steamboat coughing along up-stream, so far off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4835"></td>
        <td id="LC4835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards the other side you couldn&#39;t tell nothing about her only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4836"></td>
        <td id="LC4836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether she was a stern-wheel or side-wheel; then for about an hour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4837"></td>
        <td id="LC4837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there wouldn&#39;t be nothing to hear nor nothing to see--just solid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4838"></td>
        <td id="LC4838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lonesomeness. Next you&#39;d see a raft sliding by, away off yonder, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4839"></td>
        <td id="LC4839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">maybe a galoot on it chopping, because they&#39;re most always doing it on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4840"></td>
        <td id="LC4840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a raft; you&#39;d see the ax flash and come down--you don&#39;t hear nothing;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4841"></td>
        <td id="LC4841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you see that ax go up again, and by the time it&#39;s above the man&#39;s head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4842"></td>
        <td id="LC4842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then you hear the _k&#39;chunk!_--it had took all that time to come over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4843"></td>
        <td id="LC4843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the water. So we would put in the day, lazying around, listening to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4844"></td>
        <td id="LC4844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stillness. Once there was a thick fog, and the rafts and things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4845"></td>
        <td id="LC4845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that went by was beating tin pans so the steamboats wouldn&#39;t run over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC5115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5116"></td>
        <td id="LC5116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It didn&#39;t take me long to make up my mind that these liars warn&#39;t no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5117"></td>
        <td id="LC5117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kings nor dukes at all, but just low-down humbugs and frauds. But I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5118"></td>
        <td id="LC5118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never said nothing, never let on; kept it to myself; it&#39;s the best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5119"></td>
        <td id="LC5119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way; then you don&#39;t have no quarrels, and don&#39;t get into no trouble.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5120"></td>
        <td id="LC5120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If they wanted us to call them kings and dukes, I hadn&#39;t no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5121"></td>
        <td id="LC5121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">objections, &#39;long as it would keep peace in the family; and it warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5122"></td>
        <td id="LC5122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no use to tell Jim, so I didn&#39;t tell him. If I never learnt nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5123"></td>
        <td id="LC5123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else out of pap, I learnt that the best way to get along with his kind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5124"></td>
        <td id="LC5124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of people is to let them have their own way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5125"></td>
        <td id="LC5125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5126"></td>
        <td id="LC5126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5127"></td>
        <td id="LC5127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5129"></td>
        <td id="LC5129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XX</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5130"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5131"></td>
        <td id="LC5131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5132"></td>
        <td id="LC5132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They asked us considerable many questions; wanted to know what we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5133"></td>
        <td id="LC5133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">covered up the raft that way for, and laid by in the daytime instead</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5134"></td>
        <td id="LC5134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of running--was Jim a runaway nigger? Says I:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5135"></td>
        <td id="LC5135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5136"></td>
        <td id="LC5136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Goodness sakes! would a runaway nigger run _south?_&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5137"></td>
        <td id="LC5137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5138"></td>
        <td id="LC5138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No, they allowed he wouldn&#39;t. I had to account for things some way, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5139"></td>
        <td id="LC5139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5140"></td>
        <td id="LC5140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5141"></td>
        <td id="LC5141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;My folks was living in Pike County, in Missouri, where I was born,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5142"></td>
        <td id="LC5142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and they all died off but me and pa and my brother Ike. Pa, he &#39;lowed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5143"></td>
        <td id="LC5143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he&#39;d break up and go down and live with Uncle Ben, who&#39;s got a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5144"></td>
        <td id="LC5144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one-horse place on the river forty-four mile below Orleans. Pa was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5145"></td>
        <td id="LC5145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pretty poor, and had some debts; so when he&#39;d squared up there warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5146"></td>
        <td id="LC5146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing left but sixteen dollars and our nigger, Jim. That warn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5147"></td>
        <td id="LC5147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to take us fourteen hundred mile, deck passage nor no other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5148"></td>
        <td id="LC5148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way. Well, when the river rose pa had a streak of luck one day; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5149"></td>
        <td id="LC5149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ketched this piece of a raft; so we reckoned we&#39;d go down to Orleans</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5150"></td>
        <td id="LC5150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on it. Pa&#39;s luck didn&#39;t hold out; a steamboat run over the forrard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5151"></td>
        <td id="LC5151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corner of the raft one night, and we all went overboard and dove under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5152"></td>
        <td id="LC5152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wheel; Jim and me come up all right, but pa was drunk, and Ike was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5153"></td>
        <td id="LC5153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only four years old, so they never come up no more. Well, for the next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5154"></td>
        <td id="LC5154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">day or two we had considerable trouble, because people was always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5155"></td>
        <td id="LC5155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming out in skiffs and trying to take Jim away from me, saying they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5156"></td>
        <td id="LC5156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believed he was a runaway nigger. We don&#39;t run daytimes no more now;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5157"></td>
        <td id="LC5157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nights they don&#39;t bother us.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5158"></td>
        <td id="LC5158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5159"></td>
        <td id="LC5159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The duke says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5160"></td>
        <td id="LC5160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5161"></td>
        <td id="LC5161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Leave me alone to cipher out a way so we can run in the daytime if we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5162"></td>
        <td id="LC5162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want to. I&#39;ll think the thing over--I&#39;ll invent a plan that &#39;ll fix</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5163"></td>
        <td id="LC5163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. We&#39;ll let it alone for to-day, because of course we don&#39;t want to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5164"></td>
        <td id="LC5164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go by that town yonder in daylight--it mightn&#39;t be healthy.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5165"></td>
        <td id="LC5165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5166"></td>
        <td id="LC5166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Towards night it begun to darken up and look like rain; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5167"></td>
        <td id="LC5167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heat-lightning was squirting around low down in the sky, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5168"></td>
        <td id="LC5168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaves was beginning to shiver--it was going to be pretty ugly, it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5169"></td>
        <td id="LC5169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">easy to see that. So the duke and the king went to overhauling our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5170"></td>
        <td id="LC5170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wigwam, to see what the beds was like. My bed was a straw tick--better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5171"></td>
        <td id="LC5171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than Jim&#39;s, which was a corn-shuck tick; there&#39;s always cobs around</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5172"></td>
        <td id="LC5172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about in a shuck tick, and they poke into you and hurt; and when you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5173"></td>
        <td id="LC5173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roll over the dry shucks sound like you was rolling over in a pile of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5174"></td>
        <td id="LC5174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead leaves; it makes such a rustling that you wake up. Well, the duke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5175"></td>
        <td id="LC5175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowed he would take my bed; but the king allowed he wouldn&#39;t. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5176"></td>
        <td id="LC5176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5177"></td>
        <td id="LC5177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5178"></td>
        <td id="LC5178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I should &#39;a&#39; reckoned the difference in rank would a sejested to you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5179"></td>
        <td id="LC5179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a corn-shuck bed warn&#39;t just fitten for me to sleep on. Your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5180"></td>
        <td id="LC5180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Grace &#39;ll take the shuck bed yourself.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5181"></td>
        <td id="LC5181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5182"></td>
        <td id="LC5182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim and me was in a sweat again for a minute, being afraid there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5183"></td>
        <td id="LC5183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to be some more trouble amongst them; so we was pretty glad when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5184"></td>
        <td id="LC5184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the duke says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5185"></td>
        <td id="LC5185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5186"></td>
        <td id="LC5186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;&#39;Tis my fate to be always ground into the mire under the iron heel of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5187"></td>
        <td id="LC5187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oppression. Misfortune has broken my once haughty spirit; I yield, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5188"></td>
        <td id="LC5188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">submit; &#39;tis my fate. I am alone in the world--let me suffer; I can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5189"></td>
        <td id="LC5189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bear it.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5190"></td>
        <td id="LC5190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5191"></td>
        <td id="LC5191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We got away as soon as it was good and dark. The king told us to stand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5192"></td>
        <td id="LC5192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well out towards the middle of the river, and not show a light till we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5193"></td>
        <td id="LC5193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got a long ways below the town. We come in sight of the little bunch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5194"></td>
        <td id="LC5194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of lights by and by--that was the town, you know--and slid by, about a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5195"></td>
        <td id="LC5195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half a mile out, all right. When we was three-quarters of a mile below</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5196"></td>
        <td id="LC5196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we hoisted up our signal lantern; and about ten o&#39;clock it come on to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5197"></td>
        <td id="LC5197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rain and blow and thunder and lighten like everything; so the king</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5198"></td>
        <td id="LC5198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told us to both stay on watch till the weather got better; then him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5199"></td>
        <td id="LC5199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the duke crawled into the wigwam and turned in for the night. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5200"></td>
        <td id="LC5200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was my watch below till twelve, but I wouldn&#39;t &#39;a&#39; turned in anyway if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5201"></td>
        <td id="LC5201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I&#39;d had a bed, because a body don&#39;t see such a storm as that every day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5202"></td>
        <td id="LC5202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the week, not by a long sight. My souls, how the wind did scream</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5203"></td>
        <td id="LC5203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along! And every second or two there&#39;d come a glare that lit up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5204"></td>
        <td id="LC5204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white-caps for a half a mile around, and you&#39;d see the islands looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5205"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5295"></td>

        <td id="L5296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5296"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5384"></td>
        <td id="LC5384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_him_ pass the hat around!&quot; Then everybody said it, the preacher too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5385"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5386"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5473"></td>
        <td id="LC5473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was after sun-up now, but we went right on and didn&#39;t tie up. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5474"></td>
        <td id="LC5474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">king and the duke turned out by and by looking pretty rusty; but after</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5650"></td>
