        <td id="L5651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5651"></td>
        <td id="LC5651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Maybe Bill he gives him a chaw; maybe he lies and says he ain&#39;t got</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5652"></td>
        <td id="LC5652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">none. Some of them kinds of loafers never has a cent in the world, nor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5653"></td>
        <td id="LC5653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a chaw of tobacco of their own. They get all their chawing by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5654"></td>
        <td id="LC5654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">borrowing; they say to a fellow, &quot;I wisht you&#39;d len&#39; me a chaw, Jack,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5655"></td>
        <td id="LC5655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I jist this minute give Ben Thompson the last chaw I had&quot;--which is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5656"></td>
        <td id="LC5656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lie pretty much every time; it don&#39;t fool nobody but a stranger; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5657"></td>
        <td id="LC5657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jack ain&#39;t no stranger, so he says:</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5838"></td>
        <td id="LC5838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was going to be trouble. The streets was full, and everybody was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5839"></td>
        <td id="LC5839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excited. Everybody that seen the shooting was telling how it happened,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5840"></td>
        <td id="LC5840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and there was a big crowd packed around each one of these fellows,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5841"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5897"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5898"></td>

        <td id="L5899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5899"></td>
        <td id="LC5899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The idea of _you_ lynching anybody! It&#39;s amusing. The idea of you</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5905"></td>
        <td id="LC5905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5906"></td>
        <td id="LC5906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Do I know you? I know you clear through. I was born and raised in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5907"></td>
        <td id="LC5907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">South, and I&#39;ve lived in the North; so I know the average all around.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5908"></td>
        <td id="LC5908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The average man&#39;s a coward. In the North he lets anybody walk over him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5909"></td>
        <td id="LC5909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that wants to, and goes home and prays for a humble spirit to bear it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5910"></td>
        <td id="LC5910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the South one man, all by himself, has stopped a stage full of men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5911"></td>
        <td id="LC5911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the daytime, and robbed the lot. Your newspapers call you a brave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5912"></td>
        <td id="LC5912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people so much that you think you are braver than any other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5913"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5914"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5915"></td>
        <td id="LC5915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoot them in the back, in the dark--and it&#39;s just what they _would_</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5916"></td>
        <td id="LC5916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5917"></td>
        <td id="LC5917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5918"></td>
        <td id="LC5918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So they always acquit; and then a _man_ goes in the night, with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5919"></td>
        <td id="LC5919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundred masked cowards at his back, and lynches the rascal. Your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5920"></td>
        <td id="LC5920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mistake is, that you didn&#39;t bring a man with you; that&#39;s one mistake,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5921"></td>
        <td id="LC5921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the other is that you didn&#39;t come in the dark and fetch your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5922"></td>
        <td id="LC5922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">masks. You brought _part_ of a man--Buck Harkness, there--and if you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5923"></td>
        <td id="LC5923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hadn&#39;t had him to start you, you&#39;d &#39;a&#39; taken it out in blowing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5924"></td>
        <td id="LC5924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5925"></td>
        <td id="LC5925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You didn&#39;t want to come. The average man don&#39;t like trouble and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5926"></td>
        <td id="LC5926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger. _You_ don&#39;t like trouble and danger. But if only _half_ a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5927"></td>
        <td id="LC5927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man--like Buck Harkness, there--shouts &#39;Lynch him! lynch him!&#39; you&#39;re</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5928"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6016"></td>
        <td id="LC6016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shed seventeen suits. And, then, there he was, slim and handsome, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6017"></td>
        <td id="LC6017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dressed the gaudiest and prettiest you ever saw, and he lit into that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6018"></td>
        <td id="LC6018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horse with his whip and made him fairly hum--and finally skipped off,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6019"></td>
        <td id="LC6019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and made his bow and danced off to the dressing-room, and everybody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6020"></td>
        <td id="LC6020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just a-howling with pleasure and astonishment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6021"></td>
        <td id="LC6021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6022"></td>
        <td id="LC6022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the ringmaster he see how he had been fooled, and he _was_ the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6023"></td>
        <td id="LC6023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sickest ringmaster you ever see, I reckon. Why, it was one of his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6024"></td>
        <td id="LC6024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men! He had got up that joke all out of his own head, and never let on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6025"></td>
        <td id="LC6025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to nobody. Well, I felt sheepish enough to be took in so, but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6026"></td>
        <td id="LC6026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wouldn&#39;t &#39;a&#39; been in that ringmaster&#39;s place, not for a thousand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6027"></td>
        <td id="LC6027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dollars. I don&#39;t know; there may be bullier circuses than what that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6028"></td>
        <td id="LC6028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one was, but I never struck them yet. Anyways, it was plenty good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6029"></td>
        <td id="LC6029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough for _me_; and wherever I run across it, it can have all of _my_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6030"></td>
        <td id="LC6030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">custom every time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6031"></td>
        <td id="LC6031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6032"></td>
        <td id="LC6032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, that night we had _our_ show; but there warn&#39;t only about twelve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6033"></td>
        <td id="LC6033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people there--just enough to pay expenses. And they laughed all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6034"></td>
        <td id="LC6034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and that made the duke mad; and everybody left, anyway, before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6035"></td>
        <td id="LC6035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the show was over, but one boy which was asleep. So the duke said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6036"></td>
        <td id="LC6036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these Arkansaw lunkheads couldn&#39;t come up to Shakespeare; what they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6037"></td>
        <td id="LC6037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wanted was low comedy--and maybe something ruther worse than low</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6038"></td>
        <td id="LC6038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comedy, he reckoned. He said he could size their style. So next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6039"></td>
        <td id="LC6039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning he got some big sheets of wrapping-paper and some black paint,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6040"></td>
        <td id="LC6040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and drawed off some handbills, and stuck them up all over the village.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6041"></td>
        <td id="LC6041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The bills said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6042"></td>
        <td id="LC6042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L6050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6050"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6051"></td>
        <td id="LC6051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   Theatres,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6052"></td>
        <td id="LC6052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   In their Thrilling Tragedy of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6053"></td>
        <td id="LC6053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   THE KING&#39;S CAMELEOPARD,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6054"></td>
        <td id="LC6054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">      OR</td>

        <td id="L6055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6055"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6056"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6057"></td>
        <td id="LC6057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6058"></td>
        <td id="LC6058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then at the bottom was the biggest line of all, which said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6059"></td>
        <td id="LC6059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6060"></td>
        <td id="LC6060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   LADIES AND CHILDREN NOT ADMITTED</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6061"></td>
        <td id="LC6061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6062"></td>
        <td id="LC6062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;There,&quot; says he, &quot;if that line don&#39;t fetch them, I don&#39;t know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6063"></td>
        <td id="LC6063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Arkansaw!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6064"></td>
        <td id="LC6064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6065"></td>
        <td id="LC6065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6066"></td>
        <td id="LC6066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6067"></td>
        <td id="LC6067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6068"></td>
        <td id="LC6068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXIII</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6069"></td>
        <td id="LC6069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6070"></td>
        <td id="LC6070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6071"></td>
        <td id="LC6071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6072"></td>
        <td id="LC6072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, all day him and the king was hard at it, rigging up a stage and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6073"></td>
        <td id="LC6073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a curtain and a row of candles for footlights; and that night the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6074"></td>
        <td id="LC6074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house was jam full of men in no time. When the place couldn&#39;t hold no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6075"></td>
        <td id="LC6075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more, the duke he quit tending door and went around the back way and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6076"></td>
        <td id="LC6076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come onto the stage and stood up before the curtain and made a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6077"></td>
        <td id="LC6077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speech, and praised up this tragedy, and said it was the most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6078"></td>
        <td id="LC6078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thrillingest one that ever was; and so he went on a-bragging about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6079"></td>
        <td id="LC6079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tragedy, and about Edmund Kean the Elder, which was to play the main</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6080"></td>
        <td id="LC6080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principal part in it; and at last when he&#39;d got everybody&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6081"></td>
        <td id="LC6081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expectations up high enough, he rolled up the curtain, and the next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6082"></td>
        <td id="LC6082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minute the king come a-prancing out on all fours, naked; and he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6083"></td>
        <td id="LC6083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">painted all over, ring-streaked-and-striped, all sorts of colors, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6084"></td>
        <td id="LC6084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">splendid as a rainbow. And--but never mind the rest of his outfit; it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6085"></td>
        <td id="LC6085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was just wild, but it was awful funny. The people most killed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6086"></td>
        <td id="LC6086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves laughing; and when the king got done capering and capered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6087"></td>
        <td id="LC6087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off behind the scenes, they roared and clapped and stormed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6088"></td>
        <td id="LC6088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">haw-hawed till he come back and done it over again, and after that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6089"></td>
        <td id="LC6089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they made him do it another time. Well, it would make a cow laugh to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6090"></td>
        <td id="LC6090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see the shines that old idiot cut.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6091"></td>
        <td id="LC6091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6092"></td>
        <td id="LC6092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the duke he lets the curtain down, and bows to the people, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6093"></td>
        <td id="LC6093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says the great tragedy will be performed only two nights more, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6094"></td>
        <td id="LC6094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">accounts of pressing London engagements, where the seats is all sold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6095"></td>
        <td id="LC6095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already for it in Drury Lane; and then he makes them another bow, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6096"></td>
        <td id="LC6096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says if he has succeeded in pleasing them and instructing them, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6097"></td>
        <td id="LC6097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will be deeply obleeged if they will mention it to their friends and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6098"></td>
        <td id="LC6098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get them to come and see it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6099"></td>
        <td id="LC6099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6100"></td>
        <td id="LC6100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Twenty people sings out:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6101"></td>
        <td id="LC6101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6102"></td>
        <td id="LC6102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What, is it over?  Is that _all_?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6103"></td>
        <td id="LC6103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6104"></td>
        <td id="LC6104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The duke says yes. Then there was a fine time. Everybody sings out,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6105"></td>
        <td id="LC6105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Sold!&quot; and rose up mad, and was a-going for that stage and them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6106"></td>
        <td id="LC6106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tragedians. But a big, fine-looking man jumps up on a bench and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6107"></td>
        <td id="LC6107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shouts:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6108"></td>
        <td id="LC6108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6109"></td>
        <td id="LC6109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Hold on! Just a word, gentlemen.&quot; They stopped to listen. &quot;We are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6110"></td>
        <td id="LC6110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sold--mighty badly sold. But we don&#39;t want to be the laughing-stock of</td>

        <td id="LC6111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this whole town, I reckon, and never hear the last of this thing as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6112"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6114"></td>

        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Saxon heptarchies that used to rip around so in old times and raise</td>

        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Cain. My, you ought to seen old Henry the Eight when he was in bloom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He _was_ a blossom. He used to marry a new wife every day, and chop</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off her head next morning. And he would do it just as indifferent as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if he was ordering up eggs. &#39;Fetch up Nell Gwynn,&#39; he says. They fetch</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her up. Next morning, &#39;Chop off her head!&#39; And they chop it off.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>

        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6550"></td>
        <td id="LC6550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead tanner like they&#39;d lost the twelve disciples. Well, if ever I</td>

        <td id="LC6554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L6560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6560"></td>
        <td id="LC6560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The news was all over town in two minutes, and you could see the</td>

        <td id="LC6642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Goo-goo--goo-goo-goo&quot; all the time, like a baby that can&#39;t talk.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6643"></td>
        <td id="LC6643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6644"></td>
        <td id="LC6644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So the king he blattered along, and managed to inquire about pretty</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6734"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6823"></td>
        <td id="LC6823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you to do it. Will you?&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6824"></td>

        <td id="L6825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6825"></td>
        <td id="LC6825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mary Jane straightened herself up, and my, but she was handsome! She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6826"></td>
        <td id="LC6826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says:</td>

        <td id="L6827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6827"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6829"></td>
        <td id="LC6829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">king&#39;s hands, and says, &quot;Take this six thousand dollars, and invest</td>

        <td id="L6878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6878"></td>
        <td id="LC6878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do for to force out compliments; and the people all knowed everything</td>

        <td id="L6879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6879"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6890"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L6907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6907"></td>
        <td id="LC6907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I see I was up a stump. I had to let on to get choked with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6908"></td>
        <td id="LC6908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chicken-bone, so as to get time to think how to get down again. Then I</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6909"></td>
        <td id="LC6909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6910"></td>
        <td id="LC6910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6911"></td>
        <td id="LC6911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I mean he goes to our church regular when he&#39;s in Sheffield. That&#39;s</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6913"></td>
        <td id="LC6913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6914"></td>
        <td id="LC6914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Why, how you talk--Sheffield ain&#39;t on the sea.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6915"></td>
        <td id="LC6915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L8275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8275"></td>

        <td id="L8276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8276"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8277"></td>
        <td id="LC8277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I never hunted for no back streets, but humped it straight through the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8278"></td>
        <td id="LC8278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">main one; and when I begun to get towards our house I aimed my eye and</td>

        <td id="L8279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8279"></td>
        <td id="LC8279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set it. No light there; the house all dark--which made me feel sorry</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8366"></td>
        <td id="LC8366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the one that&#39;s entitled to it most. You hain&#39;t done a thing from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8367"></td>
        <td id="LC8367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">start that had any sense in it, except coming out so cool and cheeky</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8368"></td>
        <td id="LC8368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with that imaginary blue-arrow mark. That _was_ bright--it was right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8369"></td>
        <td id="LC8369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down bully; and it was the thing that saved us. For if it hadn&#39;t been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8370"></td>
        <td id="LC8370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for that they&#39;d &#39;a&#39; jailed us till them Englishmen&#39;s baggage come--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8371"></td>
        <td id="LC8371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then--the penitentiary, you bet! But that trick took &#39;em to the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8372"></td>
        <td id="LC8372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">graveyard, and the gold done us a still bigger kindness; for if the</td>

        <td id="L8373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8373"></td>
        <td id="LC8373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excited fools hadn&#39;t let go all holts and made that rush to get a look</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we&#39;d &#39;a&#39; slept in our cravats to-night--cravats warranted to _wear_,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8450"></td>
        <td id="LC8450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says:</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8453"></td>
        <td id="LC8453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there and blubber like a baby--it&#39;s fitten for you, after the way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8454"></td>
        <td id="LC8454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you&#39;ve acted. I never see such an old ostrich for wanting to gobble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8455"></td>
        <td id="LC8455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything--and I a-trusting you all the time, like you was my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8456"></td>
        <td id="LC8456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father. You ought to been ashamed of yourself to stand by and hear it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8457"></td>
        <td id="LC8457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saddled on to a lot of poor niggers, and you never say a word for &#39;em.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8458"></td>
        <td id="LC8458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It makes me feel ridiculous to think I was soft enough to _believe_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8459"></td>
        <td id="LC8459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that rubbage. Cuss you, I can see now why you was so anxious to make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8460"></td>
        <td id="LC8460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the deffisit--you wanted to get what money I&#39;d got out of the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC8461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;None-such&#39; and one thing or another, and scoop it _all!_&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8462"></td>

        <td id="L8463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8463"></td>
        <td id="LC8463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The king says, timid, and still a-snuffling:</td>

        <td id="LC8464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back, and all of _ourn_ but a shekel or two _besides_. G&#39;long to bed,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC8470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and don&#39;t you deffersit _me_ no more deffersits, long &#39;s _you_ live!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8471"></td>
        <td id="LC8471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="LC8472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So the king sneaked into the wigwam and took to his bottle for</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8473"></td>
        <td id="LC8473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comfort, and before long the duke tackled _his_ bottle; and so in</td>

        <td id="L8545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8545"></td>

        <td id="L8546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8546"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8547"></td>
        <td id="LC8547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8724"></td>
        <td id="LC8724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8725"></td>
        <td id="LC8725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then he didn&#39;t look so joyful, and says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8726"></td>
        <td id="LC8726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8727"></td>
        <td id="LC8727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What was your idea for asking _me?_&quot; he says.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8728"></td>
        <td id="LC8728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8729"></td>
        <td id="LC8729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well,&quot; I says, &quot;when I see the king in that doggery yesterday I says</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8730"></td>
        <td id="LC8730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to myself, we can&#39;t get him home for hours, till he&#39;s soberer; so I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8731"></td>
        <td id="LC8731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went a-loafing around town to put in the time and wait. A man up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8732"></td>
        <td id="LC8732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offered me ten cents to help him pull a skiff over the river and back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8733"></td>
        <td id="LC8733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to fetch a sheep, and so I went along; but when we was dragging him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8734"></td>
        <td id="LC8734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the boat, and the man left me a-holt of the rope and went behind him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8735"></td>
        <td id="LC8735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to shove him along, he was too strong for me and jerked loose and run,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8736"></td>
        <td id="LC8736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we after him. We didn&#39;t have no dog, and so we had to chase him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8737"></td>
        <td id="LC8737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all over the country till we tired him out. We never got him till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8738"></td>
        <td id="LC8738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark; then we fetched him over, and I started down for the raft. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8739"></td>
        <td id="LC8739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I got there and see it was gone, I says to myself, &#39;They&#39;ve got into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8740"></td>
        <td id="LC8740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble and had to leave; and they&#39;ve took my nigger, which is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8741"></td>
        <td id="LC8741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only nigger I&#39;ve got in the world, and now I&#39;m in a strange country,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8742"></td>
        <td id="LC8742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ain&#39;t got no property no more, nor nothing, and no way to make my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8743"></td>
        <td id="LC8743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living&#39;; so I set down and cried. I slept in the woods all night. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8744"></td>
        <td id="LC8744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what _did_ become of the raft, then?--and Jim--poor Jim!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8745"></td>
        <td id="LC8745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8746"></td>
        <td id="LC8746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Blamed if I know--that is, what&#39;s become of the raft. That old fool</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8747"></td>
        <td id="LC8747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had made a trade and got forty dollars, and when we found him in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8748"></td>
        <td id="LC8748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doggery the loafers had matched half-dollars with him and got every</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC8751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our raft and shook us, and run off down the river.&#39;&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8756"></td>
        <td id="LC8756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;We never thought of that. Fact is, I reckon we&#39;d come to consider him</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8757"></td>
        <td id="LC8757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_our_ nigger; yes, we did consider him so--goodness knows we had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8758"></td>
        <td id="LC8758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trouble enough for him. So when we see the raft was gone and we flat</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8759"></td>
        <td id="LC8759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broke, there warn&#39;t anything for it but to try the &#39;Royal Nonesuch&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8760"></td>
        <td id="LC8760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another shake. And I&#39;ve pegged along ever since, dry as a powder-horn.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8761"></td>

        <td id="L8763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8763"></td>

        <td id="L8764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8764"></td>
        <td id="LC8764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spend it for something to eat, and give me some, because it was all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8765"></td>
        <td id="LC8765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the money I had, and I hadn&#39;t had nothing to eat since yesterday. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8766"></td>

        <td id="L8767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8767"></td>
        <td id="LC8767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L8768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8768"></td>

        <td id="LC8773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No! That old fool sold him, and never divided with me, and the</td>

        <td id="L8779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8779"></td>
        <td id="LC8779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, you can&#39;t _get_ your nigger, that&#39;s all--so dry up your</td>

        <td id="LC8780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blubbering. Looky here--do you think _you&#39;d_ venture to blow on us?</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8781"></td>
        <td id="LC8781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Blamed if I think I&#39;d trust you. Why, if you _was_ to blow on us--&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8782"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8783"></td>
        <td id="LC8783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He stopped, but I never see the duke look so ugly out of his eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8784"></td>
        <td id="LC8784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before. I went on a-whimpering, and says:</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8785"></td>
        <td id="LC8785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8786"></td>
        <td id="LC8786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I don&#39;t want to blow on nobody; and I ain&#39;t got no time to blow,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8787"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8788"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8789"></td>
        <td id="LC8789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looked kinder bothered, and stood there with his bills fluttering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8790"></td>
        <td id="LC8790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on his arm, thinking, and wrinkling up his forehead. At last he says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8791"></td>
        <td id="LC8791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8792"></td>
        <td id="LC8792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ll tell you something. We got to be here three days. If you&#39;ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8793"></td>
        <td id="LC8793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promise you won&#39;t blow, and won&#39;t let the nigger blow, I&#39;ll tell you</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8794"></td>
        <td id="LC8794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where to find him.&quot;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8795"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8796"></td>
        <td id="LC8796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So I promised, and he says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8797"></td>
        <td id="LC8797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8798"></td>
        <td id="LC8798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;A farmer by the name of Silas Ph--&quot; and then he stopped. You see, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8799"></td>
        <td id="LC8799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started to tell me the truth; but when he stopped that way, and begun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8800"></td>
        <td id="LC8800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to study and think again, I reckoned he was changing his mind. And so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8801"></td>
        <td id="LC8801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was. He wouldn&#39;t trust me; he wanted to make sure of having me out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8802"></td>
        <td id="LC8802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the way the whole three days. So pretty soon he says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8803"></td>
        <td id="LC8803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8804"></td>
        <td id="LC8804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The man that bought him is named Abram Foster--Abram G. Foster--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8805"></td>
        <td id="LC8805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he lives forty mile back here in the country, on the road to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8806"></td>
        <td id="LC8806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lafayette.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8807"></td>
        <td id="LC8807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8808"></td>
        <td id="LC8808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All right,&quot; I says, &quot;I can walk it in three days. And I&#39;ll start this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8809"></td>
        <td id="LC8809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very afternoon.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8810"></td>
        <td id="LC8810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8811"></td>
        <td id="LC8811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No you won&#39;t, you&#39;ll start _now_; and don&#39;t you lose any time about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8812"></td>
        <td id="LC8812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, neither, nor do any gabbling by the way. Just keep a tight tongue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8813"></td>
        <td id="LC8813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in your head and move right along, and then you won&#39;t get into trouble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8814"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9086"></td>
        <td id="LC9086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here any minute, and sings out my name before I can throw him a wink</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9087"></td>
        <td id="LC9087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to keep quiet?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9088"></td>
        <td id="LC9088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9089"></td>
        <td id="LC9089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well, I couldn&#39;t _have_ it that way; it wouldn&#39;t do at all. I must go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9090"></td>
        <td id="LC9090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up the road and waylay him. So I told the folks I reckoned I would go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9091"></td>
        <td id="LC9091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up to the town and fetch down my baggage. The old gentleman was for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9092"></td>
        <td id="LC9092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going along with me, but I said no, I could drive the horse myself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9093"></td>
        <td id="LC9093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I druther he wouldn&#39;t take no trouble about me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9094"></td>
        <td id="LC9094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9099"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9101"></td>
        <td id="LC9101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So I started for town in the wagon, and when I was half-way I see a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9102"></td>
        <td id="LC9102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wagon coming, and sure enough it was Tom Sawyer, and I stopped and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9103"></td>
        <td id="LC9103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waited till he come along. I says &quot;Hold on!&quot; and it stopped alongside,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9104"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9105"></td>

        <td id="LC9106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says:</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L9110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9110"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9114"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9128"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9133"></td>
        <td id="LC9133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hit him where he lived. But I said, leave it alone till by and by; and</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him the kind of a fix I was in, and what did he reckon we better do?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9136"></td>

        <td id="L9140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9140"></td>

        <td id="LC9142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">piece, and take a fresh start, and get there a quarter or a half an</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9157"></td>
        <td id="LC9157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9172"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9174"></td>
        <td id="LC9174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9175"></td>
        <td id="LC9175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, then,&quot; I says, &quot;joking or no joking, if you hear anything said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9176"></td>
        <td id="LC9176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about a runaway nigger, don&#39;t forget to remember that _you_ don&#39;t know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9177"></td>
        <td id="LC9177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing about him, and I don&#39;t know nothing about him.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9178"></td>
        <td id="LC9178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="LC9359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little boys says:</td>

        <td id="LC9366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people; so I reckon they&#39;ve drove the owdacious loafers out of town</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9433"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9434"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9435"></td>
        <td id="LC9435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Because part of it was watermelon.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9436"></td>
        <td id="LC9436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9437"></td>
        <td id="LC9437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;So it was--I noticed it. Well, it does beat all that I never thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9438"></td>
        <td id="LC9438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about a dog not eating watermelon. It shows how a body can see and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9439"></td>
        <td id="LC9439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don&#39;t see at the same time.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9440"></td>
        <td id="LC9440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9441"></td>
        <td id="LC9441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, the nigger unlocked the padlock when he went in, and he locked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9442"></td>
        <td id="LC9442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it again when he came out. He fetched uncle a key about the time we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9443"></td>
        <td id="LC9443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got up from table--same key, I bet. Watermelon shows man, lock shows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9444"></td>
        <td id="LC9444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner; and it ain&#39;t likely there&#39;s two prisoners on such a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9445"></td>
        <td id="LC9445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plantation, and where the people&#39;s all so kind and good. Jim&#39;s the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9446"></td>
        <td id="LC9446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner. All right--I&#39;m glad we found it out detective fashion; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9447"></td>
        <td id="LC9447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wouldn&#39;t give shucks for any other way. Now you work your mind, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9448"></td>
        <td id="LC9448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">study out a plan to steal Jim, and I will study out one, too; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9449"></td>
        <td id="LC9449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we&#39;ll take the one we like the best.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9450"></td>
        <td id="LC9450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9723"></td>
        <td id="LC9723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9724"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9995"></td>
        <td id="LC9995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smouch the knives--three of them.&quot; So I done it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9996"></td>
        <td id="LC9996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10000"></td>
        <td id="LC10000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">CHAPTER XXXVI</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10001"></td>
        <td id="LC10001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10002"></td>
        <td id="LC10002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10003"></td>
        <td id="LC10003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As soon as we reckoned everybody was asleep that night we went down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10004"></td>
        <td id="LC10004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lightning-rod, and shut ourselves up in the lean-to, and got out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10005"></td>
        <td id="LC10005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our pile of fox-fire, and went to work. We cleared everything out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10006"></td>
        <td id="LC10006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the way, about four or five foot along the middle of the bottom log.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10007"></td>
        <td id="LC10007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom said we was right behind Jim&#39;s bed now, and we&#39;d dig in under it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10008"></td>
        <td id="LC10008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and when we got through there couldn&#39;t nobody in the cabin ever know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10009"></td>
        <td id="LC10009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was any hole there, because Jim&#39;s counterpin hung down most to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10010"></td>
        <td id="LC10010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ground, and you&#39;d have to raise it up and look under to see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10011"></td>
        <td id="LC10011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hole. So we dug and dug with the case-knives till most midnight; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10012"></td>
        <td id="LC10012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then we was dog-tired, and our hands was blistered, and yet you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10013"></td>
        <td id="LC10013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">couldn&#39;t see we&#39;d done anything hardly. At last I says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10014"></td>
        <td id="LC10014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10015"></td>
        <td id="LC10015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;This ain&#39;t no thirty-seven-year job; this is a thirty-eight-year job,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10016"></td>
        <td id="LC10016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom Sawyer.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10017"></td>
        <td id="LC10017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10018"></td>
        <td id="LC10018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He never said nothing. But he sighed, and pretty soon he stopped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10019"></td>
        <td id="LC10019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">digging, and then for a good little while I knowed that he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10020"></td>
        <td id="LC10020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thinking. Then he says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10021"></td>
        <td id="LC10021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10022"></td>
        <td id="LC10022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It ain&#39;t no use, Huck, it ain&#39;t a-going to work. If we was prisoners</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10023"></td>
        <td id="LC10023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it would, because then we&#39;d have as many years as we wanted, and no</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10024"></td>
        <td id="LC10024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hurry; and we wouldn&#39;t get but a few minutes to dig, every day, while</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10025"></td>
        <td id="LC10025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they was changing watches, and so our hands wouldn&#39;t get blistered,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10026"></td>
        <td id="LC10026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we could keep it up right along, year in and year out, and do it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10027"></td>
        <td id="LC10027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right, and the way it ought to be done. But _we_ can&#39;t fool along; we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10028"></td>
        <td id="LC10028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got to rush; we ain&#39;t got no time to spare. If we was to put in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10029"></td>
        <td id="LC10029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another night this way we&#39;d have to knock off for a week to let our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands get well--couldn&#39;t touch a case-knife with them sooner.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10031"></td>
        <td id="LC10031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10032"></td>
        <td id="LC10032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, then, what we going to do, Tom?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10033"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I&#39;ll tell you. It ain&#39;t right, and it ain&#39;t moral, and I wouldn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10035"></td>
