      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10036"></td>
        <td id="LC10036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dig him out with the picks, and _let on_ it&#39;s case-knives.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10037"></td>
        <td id="LC10037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10038"></td>
        <td id="LC10038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Now_ you&#39;re _talking!_&quot; I says; &quot;your head gets leveler and leveler</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10039"></td>
        <td id="LC10039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the time, Tom Sawyer,&quot; I says. &quot;Picks is the thing, moral or no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10040"></td>
        <td id="LC10040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moral; and as for me, I don&#39;t care shucks for the morality of it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10041"></td>
        <td id="LC10041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nohow. When I start in to steal a nigger, or a watermelon, or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10042"></td>
        <td id="LC10042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sunday-school book, I ain&#39;t no ways particular how it&#39;s done so it&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10043"></td>
        <td id="LC10043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done. What I want is my nigger; or what I want is my watermelon; or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10044"></td>
        <td id="LC10044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what I want is my Sunday-school book; and if a pick&#39;s the handiest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10045"></td>
        <td id="LC10045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing, that&#39;s the thing I&#39;m a-going to dig that nigger or that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10046"></td>
        <td id="LC10046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watermelon or that Sunday-school book out with; and I don&#39;t give a</td>

        <td id="LC10047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead rat what the authorities thinks about it nuther.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10048"></td>
        <td id="LC10048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10049"></td>
        <td id="LC10049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well,&quot; he says, &quot;there&#39;s excuse for picks and letting on in a case</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10050"></td>
        <td id="LC10050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like this; if it warn&#39;t so, I wouldn&#39;t approve of it, nor I wouldn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10051"></td>
        <td id="LC10051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stand by and see the rules broke--because right is right, and wrong is</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC10052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrong, and a body ain&#39;t got no business doing wrong when he ain&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10053"></td>
        <td id="LC10053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ignorant and knows better. It might answer for _you_ to dig Jim out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10054"></td>
        <td id="LC10054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a pick, _without_ any letting on, because you don&#39;t know no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10055"></td>
        <td id="LC10055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better; but it wouldn&#39;t for me, because I do know better. Gimme a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10056"></td>
        <td id="LC10056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">case-knife.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10057"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10058"></td>
        <td id="LC10058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had his own by him, but I handed him mine. He flung it down, and</td>

        <td id="L10059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10059"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10061"></td>

        <td id="L10062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10062"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10063"></td>
        <td id="LC10063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I didn&#39;t know just what to do--but then I thought. I scratched around</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10064"></td>
        <td id="LC10064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amongst the old tools, and got a pickax and give it to him, and he</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10065"></td>
        <td id="LC10065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">took it and went to work, and never said a word.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10066"></td>

        <td id="L10067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10067"></td>
        <td id="LC10067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was always just that particular. Full of principle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10068"></td>
        <td id="LC10068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10069"></td>
        <td id="LC10069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So then I got a shovel, and then we picked and shoveled, turn about,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10070"></td>
        <td id="LC10070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and made the fur fly. We stuck to it about a half an hour, which was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10071"></td>
        <td id="LC10071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as long as we could stand up; but we had a good deal of a hole to show</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10072"></td>
        <td id="LC10072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for it. When I got up-stairs I looked out at the window and see Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10073"></td>
        <td id="LC10073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing his level best with the lightning-rod, but he couldn&#39;t come it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10074"></td>
        <td id="LC10074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hands was so sore. At last he says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10075"></td>
        <td id="LC10075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10076"></td>
        <td id="LC10076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It ain&#39;t no use, it can&#39;t be done. What you reckon I better do? Can&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10077"></td>
        <td id="LC10077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you think of no way?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10078"></td>
        <td id="LC10078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10079"></td>
        <td id="LC10079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes,&quot; I says, &quot;but I reckon it ain&#39;t regular. Come up the stairs, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10080"></td>
        <td id="LC10080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">let on it&#39;s a lightning-rod.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10081"></td>
        <td id="LC10081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10082"></td>
        <td id="LC10082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So he done it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10083"></td>
        <td id="LC10083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10084"></td>
        <td id="LC10084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Next day Tom stole a pewter spoon and a brass candlestick in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10085"></td>
        <td id="LC10085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, for to make some pens for Jim out of, and six tallow candles;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10086"></td>
        <td id="LC10086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I hung around the nigger cabins and laid for a chance, and stole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10087"></td>
        <td id="LC10087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three tin plates. Tom says it wasn&#39;t enough; but I said nobody</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10088"></td>
        <td id="LC10088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wouldn&#39;t ever see the plates that Jim throwed out, because they&#39;d fall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10089"></td>
        <td id="LC10089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the dog-fennel and jimpson weeds under the window-hole--then we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10090"></td>
        <td id="LC10090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could tote them back and he could use them over again. So Tom was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10091"></td>
        <td id="LC10091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">satisfied. Then he says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10092"></td>
        <td id="LC10092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10093"></td>
        <td id="LC10093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Now, the thing to study out is, how to get the things to Jim.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10094"></td>
        <td id="LC10094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10095"></td>
        <td id="LC10095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Take them in through the hole,&quot; I says, &quot;when we get it done.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10096"></td>
        <td id="LC10096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10097"></td>
        <td id="LC10097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He only just looked scornful, and said something about nobody ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10098"></td>
        <td id="LC10098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard of such an idiotic idea, and then he went to studying. By and by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10099"></td>
        <td id="LC10099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he said he had ciphered out two or three ways, but there warn&#39;t no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10100"></td>
        <td id="LC10100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">need to decide on any of them yet. Said we&#39;d got to post Jim first.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10101"></td>
        <td id="LC10101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10102"></td>
        <td id="LC10102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That night we went down the lightning-rod a little after ten, and took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10103"></td>
        <td id="LC10103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of the candles along, and listened under the window-hole, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10104"></td>
        <td id="LC10104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard Jim snoring; so we pitched it in, and it didn&#39;t wake him. Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10105"></td>
        <td id="LC10105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we whirled in with the pick and shovel, and in about two hours and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10106"></td>
        <td id="LC10106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half the job was done. We crept in under Jim&#39;s bed and into the cabin,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10107"></td>
        <td id="LC10107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and pawed around and found the candle and lit it, and stood over Jim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10108"></td>
        <td id="LC10108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awhile, and found him looking hearty and healthy, and then we woke him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10109"></td>
        <td id="LC10109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up gentle and gradual. He was so glad to see us he most cried; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10110"></td>
        <td id="LC10110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called us honey, and all the pet names he could think of; and was for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10111"></td>
        <td id="LC10111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having us hunt up a cold-chisel to cut the chain off of his leg with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10112"></td>
        <td id="LC10112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right away, and clearing out without losing any time. But Tom he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10113"></td>
        <td id="LC10113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">showed him how unregular it would be, and set down and told him all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10114"></td>
        <td id="LC10114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about our plans, and how we could alter them in a minute any time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10115"></td>
        <td id="LC10115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was an alarm; and not to be the least afraid, because we would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10116"></td>
        <td id="LC10116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see he got away, _sure_. So Jim he said it was all right, and we set</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10117"></td>
        <td id="LC10117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there and talked over old times awhile, and then Tom asked a lot of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10118"></td>
        <td id="LC10118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questions, and when Jim told him Uncle Silas come in every day or two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10119"></td>
        <td id="LC10119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to pray with him, and Aunt Sally come in to see if he was comfortable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10120"></td>
        <td id="LC10120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and had plenty to eat, and both of them was kind as they could be, Tom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10121"></td>
        <td id="LC10121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10122"></td>
        <td id="LC10122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10123"></td>
        <td id="LC10123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Now_ I know how to fix it. We&#39;ll send you some things by them.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10124"></td>
        <td id="LC10124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10125"></td>
        <td id="LC10125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said, &quot;Don&#39;t do nothing of the kind; it&#39;s one of the most jackass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10126"></td>
        <td id="LC10126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ideas I ever struck&quot;; but he never paid no attention to me; went right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10127"></td>
        <td id="LC10127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on. It was his way when he&#39;d got his plans set.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10128"></td>
        <td id="LC10128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10129"></td>
        <td id="LC10129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So he told Jim how we&#39;d have to smuggle in the rope-ladder pie and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10130"></td>
        <td id="LC10130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other large things by Nat, the nigger that fed him, and he must be on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10131"></td>
        <td id="LC10131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lookout, and not be surprised, and not let Nat see him open them;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10132"></td>
        <td id="LC10132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and we would put small things in uncle&#39;s coat pockets and he must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10133"></td>
        <td id="LC10133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steal them out; and we would tie things to aunt&#39;s apron-strings or put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10134"></td>
        <td id="LC10134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them in her apron pocket, if we got a chance; and told him what they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10135"></td>
        <td id="LC10135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be and what they was for. And told him how to keep a journal on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10136"></td>
        <td id="LC10136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the shirt with his blood, and all that. He told him everything. Jim he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10137"></td>
        <td id="LC10137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">couldn&#39;t see no sense in the most of it, but he allowed we was white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10138"></td>
        <td id="LC10138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">folks and knowed better than him; so he was satisfied, and said he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10139"></td>
        <td id="LC10139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would do it all just as Tom said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10140"></td>
        <td id="LC10140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10141"></td>
        <td id="LC10141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jim had plenty corn-cob pipes and tobacco; so we had a right down good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10142"></td>
        <td id="LC10142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sociable time; then we crawled out through the hole, and so home to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10143"></td>
        <td id="LC10143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed, with hands that looked like they&#39;d been chawed. Tom was in high</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10144"></td>
        <td id="LC10144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spirits. He said it was the best fun he ever had in his life, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10145"></td>
        <td id="LC10145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most intellectural; and said if he only could see his way to it we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10146"></td>
        <td id="LC10146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would keep it up all the rest of our lives and leave Jim to our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10147"></td>
        <td id="LC10147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children to get out; for he believed Jim would come to like it better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10148"></td>
        <td id="LC10148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and better the more he got used to it. He said that in that way it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10149"></td>
        <td id="LC10149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could be strung out to as much as eighty year, and would be the best</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10150"></td>
        <td id="LC10150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time on record. And he said it would make us all celebrated that had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10151"></td>
        <td id="LC10151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand in it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10152"></td>
        <td id="LC10152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10153"></td>
        <td id="LC10153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the morning we went out to the woodpile and chopped up the brass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10154"></td>
        <td id="LC10154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">candlestick into handy sizes, and Tom put them and the pewter spoon in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10155"></td>
        <td id="LC10155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his pocket. Then we went to the nigger cabins, and while I got Nat&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10156"></td>
        <td id="LC10156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">notice off, Tom shoved a piece of candlestick into the middle of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10157"></td>
        <td id="LC10157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corn-pone that was in Jim&#39;s pan, and we went along with Nat to see how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10158"></td>
        <td id="LC10158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it would work, and it just worked noble; when Jim bit into it it most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10159"></td>
        <td id="LC10159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mashed all his teeth out; and there warn&#39;t ever anything could &#39;a&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10160"></td>
        <td id="LC10160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worked better. Tom said so himself. Jim he never let on but what it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10161"></td>
        <td id="LC10161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was only just a piece of rock or something like that that&#39;s always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10162"></td>
        <td id="LC10162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting into bread, you know; but after that he never bit into nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10163"></td>
        <td id="LC10163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but what he jabbed his fork into it in three or four places first.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10164"></td>
        <td id="LC10164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10165"></td>
        <td id="LC10165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And whilst we was a-standing there in the dimmish light, here comes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10166"></td>
        <td id="LC10166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">couple of the hounds bulging in from under Jim&#39;s bed; and they kept on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10167"></td>
        <td id="LC10167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">piling in till there was eleven of them, and there warn&#39;t hardly room</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10168"></td>
        <td id="LC10168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in there to get your breath. By jings, we forgot to fasten that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10169"></td>
        <td id="LC10169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lean-to door! The nigger Nat he only just hollered &quot;Witches&quot; once, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10170"></td>
        <td id="LC10170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keeled over onto the floor amongst the dogs, and begun to groan like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10171"></td>
        <td id="LC10171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was dying. Tom jerked the door open and flung out a slab of Jim&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10172"></td>
        <td id="LC10172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meat, and the dogs went for it, and in two seconds he was out himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10173"></td>
        <td id="LC10173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and back again and shut the door, and I knowed he&#39;d fixed the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10174"></td>

        <td id="L10533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10533"></td>

        <td id="LC10556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  _1. Here a captive heart busted.</td>

        <td id="LC10568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom&#39;s voice trembled whilst he was reading them, and he most broke</td>

        <td id="L10577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10577"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10617"></td>

        <td id="L10618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10618"></td>
        <td id="LC10618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You got any spiders in here, Jim?&quot;</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;No, sah, thanks to goodness I hain&#39;t, Mars Tom.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10621"></td>
        <td id="LC10621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10622"></td>
        <td id="LC10622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;All right, we&#39;ll get you some.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC11250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Oh,&quot; he says. And after a minute, he says:</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11514"></td>
        <td id="LC11514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The old man was uptown again before breakfast, but couldn&#39;t get no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11515"></td>
        <td id="LC11515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">track of Tom; and both of them set at the table thinking, and not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11516"></td>
        <td id="LC11516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying nothing, and looking mournful, and their coffee getting cold,</td>

        <td id="L11517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11517"></td>

        <td id="L11594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11594"></td>

        <td id="L11595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11595"></td>
        <td id="LC11595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to stick plumb until daylight this morning; and I never see a nigger</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11596"></td>

        <td id="LC11597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freedom to do it, and was all tired out, too, and I see plain enough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11598"></td>
        <td id="LC11598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he&#39;d been worked main hard lately. I liked the nigger for that; I tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11599"></td>
        <td id="LC11599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, gentlemen, a nigger like that is worth a thousand dollars--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11600"></td>
        <td id="LC11600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kind treatment, too. I had everything I needed, and the boy was doing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11601"></td>
        <td id="LC11601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as well there as he would &#39;a&#39; done at home--better, maybe, because it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11602"></td>
        <td id="LC11602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was so quiet; but there I _was_, with both of &#39;m on my hands, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11603"></td>

        <td id="L11854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11854"></td>
        <td id="LC11854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The first time I catched Tom private I asked him what was his idea,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11856"></td>
        <td id="LC11856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worked all right and he managed to set a nigger free that was already</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11865"></td>
        <td id="LC11865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as well the way it was.</td>

        <td id="L11866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11866"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11867"></td>
        <td id="LC11867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We had Jim out of the chains in no time, and when Aunt Polly and Uncle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11868"></td>
        <td id="LC11868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Silas and Aunt Sally found out how good he helped the doctor nurse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11869"></td>
        <td id="LC11869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tom, they made a heap of fuss over him, and fixed him up prime, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11870"></td>
        <td id="LC11870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">give him all he wanted to eat, and a good time, and nothing to do. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11871"></td>
        <td id="LC11871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we had him up to the sick-room, and had a high talk; and Tom give Jim</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11872"></td>
        <td id="LC11872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forty dollars for being prisoner for us so patient, and doing it up so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11873"></td>
        <td id="LC11873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good, and Jim was pleased most to death and busted out, and says:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11874"></td>
        <td id="LC11874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11875"></td>
        <td id="LC11875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;_Dah_, now, Huck, what I tell you?--what I tell you up dah on Jackson</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11876"></td>
        <td id="LC11876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Islan&#39;? I tole you I got a hairy breas&#39;, en what&#39;s de sign un it; en I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11877"></td>
        <td id="LC11877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_tole_ you I ben rich wunst, en gwineter to be rich _ag&#39;in;_ en it&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11878"></td>
        <td id="LC11878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come true; en heah she _is! Dah_, now! doan&#39; talk to _me_--signs is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11879"></td>
        <td id="LC11879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_signs_, mine I tell you; en I knowed jis&#39; &#39;s well &#39;at I &#39;uz gwineter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11880"></td>
        <td id="LC11880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be rich ag&#39;in as I&#39;s a-stannin&#39; heah dis minute!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11881"></td>
        <td id="LC11881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11882"></td>
        <td id="LC11882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And then Tom he talked along and talked along, and says, le&#39;s all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11883"></td>
        <td id="LC11883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three slide out of here one of these nights and get an outfit, and go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11884"></td>
        <td id="LC11884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for howling adventures amongst the Injuns, over in the territory, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11885"></td>
        <td id="LC11885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a couple of weeks or two; and I says, all right, that suits me, but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11886"></td>
        <td id="LC11886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ain&#39;t got no money for to buy the outfit, and I reckon I couldn&#39;t get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11887"></td>
        <td id="LC11887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">none from home, because it&#39;s likely pap&#39;s been back before now, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11888"></td>
        <td id="LC11888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got it all away from Judge Thatcher and drunk it up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11889"></td>
        <td id="LC11889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L11890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11890"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11891"></td>
        <td id="LC11891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and more; and your pap hain&#39;t ever been back since. Hadn&#39;t when I come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11892"></td>

        <td id="L11894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11894"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12151"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12244"></td>
        <td id="LC12244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12245"></td>
